Learn With Locals while you travel

Upskill and connect with likeminded people

LEARN MORE

Imagine going to Bali and instead of just doing the typical tourist stuff, you might be able to pick up a new skill and connect with likeminded locals.
Learn with Locals allows you to learn new skills from local experts while you're traveling.

What do you want to learn?

Blogging

Learn how to structure and write relevant blogposts and create unique content from a digital nomad journalist in Bali

Bali, Indonesia

Web development

Learn how to code and and create your own website, blog or online shop while exploring Bali with locals.
